A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1. George Lucas never would’ve let us hanging with snoke like that. At least we saw Darth Maul fight somebody. 2. snoke dies\, and kylo is slayin first order soldiers and Ray is struggling\, after that Ray is suddenly equally as strong as Kylo when battling for the lightsaber?? 3. The entire story of Fin could’ve and should’ve been done w/o Phasma and the new girl he was running around with. They are unnecessary parts of the plot going back to the force awakens 4. I understand Luke did the whole Ben Kenobi thing in a cooler way\, but I didn’t want to see him be a grumpy old man for 1.5 hrs 5. The entire part of the plot where the first order is following the rebellion until they run out of fuel was boring and uncreative 6. Leia is strong with the force yeah but not a Jedi. Cmon now 7. The kid at the end of the credits make me dislike it even more because this shouldve been a really dark movie like the empire strikes back\, but it wasn’t and they just had to squeeze heartfelt moments into the movie
